articles.author: Silvia Amaro
articles.title: Goldman Sachs makes two big predictions about Europe's economic recovery - CNBC
articles.description: Experts at Goldman have laid down their predictions for an expected recovery in the euro zone, highlighting when they believe the ECB will lift its stimulus measures.
articles.content:
People wearing face masks walk in front of a big Euro sign in Frankfurt am Main, western Germany, as the European Central Bank (ECB) headquarters can be seen in the background on April, 24, 2020.

articles.title: Minister outlines process to obtain Covid cert for travel abroad - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The Government has signed up to the European Union’s Digital Covid Certificate
articles.content:
A Government Minister has outlined the process by which people will be able to apply for a Covid certificate to travel abroad this summer.
